title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Apr 27 SU [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Sunday, 27 April 2014


[sebaygo1]

Show description from theweb site :: On this Sunday, April 27 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex takes Judas Goat Glenn Beck to task for his support of the federal government during the Bundy affair and examines the deep insider and globalist connections within his media operation. 

Alex also takes a look at the unfolding situation in Ukraine as the coup government in Kiev surrounds the renegade city of Slavyansk with thousands of troops and hundreds of tanks. Ukraine's deputy foreign minister has said Russian military maneuvers involving air and ground forces along the Ukraine border are "very dangerous development" while other members of the junta warn war with Russia looms.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
